price: 12. Kasi akoboya kondima sé molekisi ndelo mosumuki.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
